title: Hui You Tian Shi Ti Wo Ai Ni - Novel Updates
author: Ming Xiao Xi
description:
“How long will your love for me last?”

“Forever.”

“…… How long is forever?”

“Even if you no longer love me, even if you’ve already forgotten about me, even if I have vanished from this world, I will still love you.”

“Nonsense! How can you love me, when you’re no longer here?”

“I will find an angel, and have it love you on my behalf.”>
